name: Advanced Survey Builder
description: Create sophisticated assessment surveys with 25+ question types, conditional logic, and branching scenarios to gather precise insights.

name: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
description: Monitor engagement metrics, response rates, and key performance indicators with live dashboards powered by BigQuery and D3.js visualizations.

name: Multi-tenant Security
description: Enterprise-grade security with row-level access control, complete tenant isolation, and comprehensive audit logging for data governance.

name: Psychometric Assessment Engine
description: Built-in support for PERSI, EMOCI, ORGCI personality and emotional intelligence assessments with advanced scoring algorithms.

name: Change Data Capture (CDC)
description: Real-time data streaming from PostgreSQL to BigQuery using Google Datastream for instant analytics and reporting capabilities.

name: Voice-Enabled Interviews
description: AI-powered voice agent integration for conducting automated interviews and qualitative assessments at scale.

name: Team Management & RBAC
description: Comprehensive role-based access control with team hierarchies, permission management, and organizational structure support.

name: RAG-Powered Insights
description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation for intelligent report generation, trend analysis, and actionable recommendations from survey data.

name: Enterprise Integrations
description: Seamless integration with SAML SSO, directory sync (SCIM), and popular HR platforms for streamlined user management.

name: Automated Reporting
description: Scheduled reports, custom dashboards, and automated insights delivery via email, Slack, or API webhooks.

name: Data Export & API
description: Comprehensive REST API and data export capabilities for integration with existing business intelligence and analytics tools.

name: Cloud-Native Architecture
description: Built on Google Cloud Platform with auto-scaling, high availability, and enterprise-grade infrastructure for mission-critical assessments.
